pullrequest.title: Feature System Part 3: Revolute Joint (plus framework for other joint types)

content.raw:
I'm looking foward to thinking about how to partition lists of features to support different physics engines, but we can wait to do that.

The main issue with this branch right now is that it doesn't compile on windows (as noted in some other comments in this PR).
content.html:
I'm looking foward to thinking about how to partition lists of features to support different physics engines, but we can wait to do that.

The main issue with this branch right now is that it doesn't compile on windows (as noted in some other comments in this PR).
